00031 // Create a Message object with the given data length and message Id.
00032 Message::Message(const uint8_t msgId, const uint16_t length, const uint16_t maxLength)
00033 {
00034         CMT_CHECKASSIGN
00035 
00036         if (maxLength < CMT_MAXMSGLEN)
00037                 m_maxLength = CMT_MAXMSGLEN;
00038         else
00039                 m_maxLength = maxLength;
00040         m_buffer = (MessageHeader*) new char[m_maxLength];//(MessageHeader*) malloc(m_maxLength);
00041         MSGLOG("Message(%02x, %hu, %hu): buffer = %p\n",(int32_t) msgId, length, m_maxLength,m_buffer);
00042         memset(m_buffer,0,m_maxLength);
00043 
00044         m_buffer->m_preamble = CMT_PREAMBLE;
00045         m_buffer->m_messageId = msgId;
00046         m_buffer->m_busId = CMT_BID_MASTER;
00047 
00048         if (length >= 255)
00049         {
00050                 m_buffer->m_length = CMT_EXTLENCODE;
00051 
00052                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high = (uint8_t) (length >> 8);
00053                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low = (uint8_t) length;
00054 
00055                 m_checksum = &(((uint8_t*) m_buffer)[length + CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADER]);
00056                 m_checksum[0] = -(msgId + CMT_EXTLENCODE + (uint8_t)length + (length >> 8));
00057         }
00058         else
00059         {
00060                 m_buffer->m_length = (uint8_t) length;
00061                 m_checksum = &(((uint8_t*) m_buffer)[length + CMT_LEN_MSGHEADER]);
00062                 m_checksum[0] = -(msgId + (uint8_t) length);
00063         }
00064         m_checksum[0] -= CMT_BID_MASTER;
00065 
00066         m_autoUpdateChecksum = true;
00067 }

00070 // Create a message from the given source string
00071 Message::Message(const uint8_t* source, const uint16_t size, const uint16_t maxLength)
00072 {
00073         CMT_CHECKASSIGN
00074 
00075         const MessageHeader* tmp = (MessageHeader*) source;
00076         uint16_t length;
00077 
00078         if (maxLength < CMT_MAXMSGLEN)
00079                 m_maxLength = CMT_MAXMSGLEN;
00080         else
00081                 m_maxLength = maxLength;
00082 
00083         if (tmp->m_length == CMT_EXTLENCODE)
00084                 length = ((uint16_t) tmp->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high * 256 + (uint16_t) tmp->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low) + CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADERCS;
00085         else
00086                 length = tmp->m_length + CMT_LEN_MSGHEADERCS;
00087         if (size && size < length)
00088                 length = size;
00089 
00090         if ((uint32_t) length > m_maxLength)
00091                 m_maxLength = length;
00092 
00093         m_buffer = (MessageHeader*) new char[m_maxLength];//(MessageHeader*) malloc(m_maxLength);
00094         MSGLOG("Message(%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x, %hu, %hu): buffer = %p\n",source[0],source[1],source[2],source[3],source[4],source[5], size, m_maxLength,m_buffer);
00095         if (length < m_maxLength)
00096                 memset(&(((uint8_t*) m_buffer)[length]),0,m_maxLength-length);
00097 
00098         memcpy(m_buffer,source,length);
00099 
00100         m_checksum = &(((uint8_t*) m_buffer)[length-1]);
00101 
00102         m_autoUpdateChecksum = true;
00103 }
00104 
00105 Message::Message(const Message& src)
00106 {
00107         CMT_CHECKASSIGN;
00108 
00109         m_maxLength = src.m_maxLength;
00110         m_buffer = (MessageHeader*) new char[m_maxLength];
00111         memcpy(m_buffer,src.m_buffer,m_maxLength);
00112         ptrdiff_t add = (uint8_t*) src.m_checksum - (uint8_t*) src.m_buffer;
00113         m_checksum = (uint8_t*) m_buffer + add;
00114         m_autoUpdateChecksum = true;
00115 }

00123         CHKDELNUL(m_buffer);//free(m_buffer);

00127 // Clear all data in the message
00128 void Message::clear(void)
00129 {
00130         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00131 
00132         memset(m_buffer,0,m_maxLength);
00133         m_checksum = &(((uint8_t*) m_buffer)[CMT_LEN_MSGHEADER]);
00134         m_buffer->m_preamble = CMT_PREAMBLE;
00135         m_buffer->m_busId = CMT_BID_MASTER;
00136         m_checksum[0] = (uint8_t) (-CMT_BID_MASTER);
00137 }

00140 // Return the current value of the data as a double (64 bits).
00141 double Message::getDataDouble(const uint16_t offset) const
00142 {
00143         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00144         double ret;
00145         uint8_t* dest = (uint8_t*) &ret;
00146         uint8_t* src = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00147         dest[0] = src[7];       dest[1] = src[6];       dest[2] = src[5];       dest[3] = src[4];
00148         dest[4] = src[3];       dest[5] = src[2];       dest[6] = src[1];       dest[7] = src[0];
00149         
00150         return ret;
00151 }

00154 // Return the current value of the data as a float (32 bits).

00160         uint8_t* src = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00161         dest[0] = src[3];
00162         dest[1] = src[2];
00163         dest[2] = src[1];
00164         dest[3] = src[0];
00165         
00166         return ret;

00170 // Return the current value of the data as a double(64 bits), after converting it from F1220.
00171 double Message::getDataF1220(const uint16_t offset) const
00172 {
00173         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00174         double ret;
00175         int32_t tmp;
00176         uint8_t* dest = (uint8_t*) &tmp;
00177         uint8_t* src = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00178         dest[0] = src[3];
00179         dest[1] = src[2];
00180         dest[2] = src[1];
00181         dest[3] = src[0];
00182 
00183         ret = ((double) tmp)/1048576.0;
00184         return ret;
00185 }
00186 
00187 // little endian
00188 union Itypes {
00189         int64_t i64;
00190         struct {
00191                 int32_t i1,i0;
00192         } i32;
00193         struct {
00194                 int16_t s3,s2,s1,s0;
00195         } i16;
00196         struct {
00197                 signed char b7,b6,b5,b4,b3,b2,b1,b0;
00198         } i8;
00199 
00200         double d;
00201         struct {
00202                 float f1,f0;
00203         } f32;
00204 };

00207 // Return the current value of the data as a double(64 bits), after converting it from FP1632.
00208 double Message::getDataFP1632(const uint16_t offset) const
00209 {
00210         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00211 
00212         int16_t fpint;
00213         int32_t fpfrac;
00214 
00215         uint8_t* dest = (uint8_t*) &fpfrac;
00216         uint8_t* src = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00217         dest[3] = *(src++);
00218         dest[2] = *(src++);
00219         dest[1] = *(src++);
00220         dest[0] = *(src++);
00221 
00222         dest = (uint8_t*) &fpint;
00223         dest[1] = *(src++);
00224         dest[0] = *(src++);
00225 
00226         Itypes fp;
00227         fp.i32.i0 = fpint;
00228         fp.i32.i1 = fpfrac;
00229 
00230         return (double) fp.i64 / 4294967296.0;
00231 }

00234 // Return current data value as a double(64 bits), after converting it from
00235 // float, double, FP1632 or FP1220 depending on outputSettings
00236 double Message::getDataFPValue(const uint64_t outputSettings, const uint16_t offset) const
00237 {
00238         switch (outputSettings & CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_MASK)
00239         {
00240                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FLOAT:
00241                         return getDataFloat(offset);
00242 
00243                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_DOUBLE:
00244                         return getDataDouble(offset);
00245 
00246                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FP1632:
00247                         return getDataFP1632(offset);
00248 
00249                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_F1220:
00250                         return getDataF1220(offset);
00251         }
00252         return 0.0; // should never happen
00253 }
00254 
00256 // Return current data values as a double(64 bits), after converting it from
00257 // float, double, FP1632 or FP1220 depending on outputSettings
00258 void Message::getDataFPValue(double *dest, const uint64_t outputSettings, uint16_t offset, const int16_t numValues) const
00259 {
00260         for (uint16_t i=0; i<numValues; i++) {
00261                 switch (outputSettings & CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_MASK)
00262                 {
00263                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FLOAT:
00264                                 *dest++ = getDataFloat(offset);
00265                                 offset += 4;
00266                                 break;
00267 
00268                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_DOUBLE:
00269                                 *dest++ = getDataDouble(offset);
00270                                 offset += 8;
00271                                 break;
00272 
00273                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FP1632:
00274                                 *dest++ = getDataFP1632(offset);
00275                                 offset += 6;
00276                                 break;
00277 
00278                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_F1220:
00279                                 *dest++ = getDataF1220(offset);
00280                                 offset += 4;
00281                 }
00282         }
00283 }

00316 // Return the length of the message buffer.
00317 uint16_t Message::getDataSize(void) const
00318 {
00319         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00320         if (m_buffer->m_length == 255)
00321                 return ((uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high * 256 + (uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low);
00322         else
00323                 return m_buffer->m_length;
00324 }

00327 // Internal function to get the start of the data buffer.
00328 uint8_t* Message::getDataStart(void) const
00329 {
00330         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00331         if (m_buffer->m_length == 255)
00332         {
00333                 return const_cast<uint8_t*>(m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_data);
00334         }
00335         else
00336                 return const_cast<uint8_t*>(m_buffer->m_datlen.m_data);

00340 // Return the length of the message buffer.

00342 {

00344         if (m_buffer->m_length == 255)
00345                 return ((uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high * 256 + (uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low) + CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADERCS;
00346         else
00347                 return m_buffer->m_length + CMT_LEN_MSGHEADERCS;

00349 
00351 bool Message::isChecksumOk(void) const
00352 {
00353         if (getTotalMessageSize() > m_maxLength)
00354                 return false;
00355         return calcChecksum() == m_checksum[0];
00356 }

00359 // Read the entire message from the given source string
00360 XsensResultValue Message::loadFromString(const uint8_t* source, const uint16_t size)
00361 {
00362         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00363         MSGLOG(__FUNCTION__ " size=%hu, first 7 bytes: %02x %02x %02x %02x %02x %02x %02x\n",size,source[0],source[1],source[2],source[3],source[4],source[5],source[6]);
00364         if (size > m_maxLength)
00365         {
00366                 MSGLOG(__FUNCTION__ " returns XRV_PARAMINVALID\n");
00367                 return XRV_PARAMINVALID;
00368         }
00369         memcpy(m_buffer,source,size);
00370         m_checksum = ((uint8_t*) m_buffer) + size-1;
00371         // check the size
00372         if (m_buffer->m_length == CMT_EXTLENCODE)
00373         {
00374                 if (((uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high * 256 + (uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low) > size-CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADERCS)
00375                 {
00376                         MSGLOG(__FUNCTION__ " returns XRV_DATACORRUPT (extended length)\n");
00377                         return XRV_DATACORRUPT;
00378                 }
00379         }
00380         else
00381         {
00382                 if (m_buffer->m_length > size-CMT_LEN_MSGHEADERCS)
00383                 {
00384                         MSGLOG(__FUNCTION__ " returns XRV_DATACORRUPT (normal length)\n");
00385                         return XRV_DATACORRUPT;
00386                 }
00387         }
00388 
00389         if (m_checksum[0] != calcChecksum())
00390         {
00391                 MSGLOG(__FUNCTION__ " returns XRV_CHECKSUMFAULT\n");
00392                 return XRV_CHECKSUMFAULT;
00393         }
00394 
00395         MSGLOG(__FUNCTION__ " returns XRV_OK\n");
00396         return XRV_OK;
00397 }
00398 
00400 void Message::resizeData(const uint16_t newSize)
00401 {
00402         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00403         int32_t index, oldLength;
00404 
00405         MSGLOG("Message.resizeData(%hu): buffer = %p\n",newSize,m_buffer);
00406 
00407         if ((uint32_t) (newSize + CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADERCS) > m_maxLength)
00408         {
00409                 uint16_t newLen = (uint16_t) (m_maxLength+m_maxLength);
00410                 if ((newSize + CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADERCS) > newLen)
00411                         newLen = newSize + CMT_LEN_MSGEXTHEADERCS;
00412                 m_buffer = (MessageHeader*) realloc(m_buffer,newLen);
00413                 m_maxLength = newLen;
00414         }
00415 
00416         MSGLOG("Message.resizeData after realloc(%hu): buffer = %p\n",m_maxLength,m_buffer);
00417 
00418         if (newSize >= CMT_EXTLENCODE)
00419         {
00420                 if (m_buffer->m_length < CMT_EXTLENCODE)
00421                 {
00422                         // make extended, shift all data 2 bytes up
00423                         for (index = (int32_t) m_buffer->m_length; index >= 0; --index)
00424                                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_data[index] =
00425                                                                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_data[index];
00426         
00427                         oldLength = m_buffer->m_length;
00428                         m_buffer->m_length = CMT_EXTLENCODE;
00429                 }
00430                 else
00431                 {
00432                         oldLength = ((uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high * 256 + (uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low);
00433                 }
00434                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high = (uint8_t) (newSize >> 8);
00435                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low = (uint8_t) newSize;
00436 
00437                 for (index = oldLength; index < newSize; ++index)
00438                         m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_data[index] = 0;
00439 
00440                 m_checksum = &m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_data[newSize];
00441         }
00442         else
00443         {
00444                 if (m_buffer->m_length == CMT_EXTLENCODE)
00445                 {
00446                         oldLength = ((uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_high * 256 + (uint16_t) m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_length.m_low);
00447                         // un-extend, shift all data 2 bytes down
00448                         for (index = 0; index < newSize; ++index)
00449                                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_data[index] =
00450                                                                 m_buffer->m_datlen.m_extended.m_data[index];
00451                 }
00452                 else
00453                         oldLength = m_buffer->m_length;
00454                 m_buffer->m_length = (uint8_t) newSize;
00455                 for (index = oldLength; index < newSize; ++index)
00456                         m_buffer->m_datlen.m_data[index] = 0;
00457                 m_checksum = &m_buffer->m_datlen.m_data[newSize];
00458         }
00459         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00460                 recomputeChecksum();
00461         MSGLOG("Message.resizeData end(%hu): buffer = %p\n",m_maxLength,m_buffer);
00462         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00463 }

00466 // Set the new value of the m_busId field and update the checksum.
00467 void Message::setBusId(const uint8_t busId)
00468 {
00469         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00470         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00471                 m_checksum[0] += m_buffer->m_busId - busId;
00472         m_buffer->m_busId = busId;
00473 }

00476 // Write a string of bytes into the data buffer.
00477 void Message::setDataBuffer(const uint8_t* data, const uint16_t offset,
00478                                                 const uint16_t count)
00479 {
00480         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00481         if (getDataSize() < offset+count)
00482                 resizeData(offset+count);
00483 
00484         if (count > 0)
00485         {
00486                 uint8_t * dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00487                 for (uint16_t i = 0;i < count;++i)
00488                 {
00489                         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00490                                 m_checksum[0] += dest[i] - data[i];
00491                         dest[i] = data[i];
00492                 }
00493         }
00494 }

00497 void Message::setDataByte(const uint8_t data, const uint16_t offset)
00498 {
00499         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00500         if (getDataSize() < offset + 1)
00501                 resizeData(offset+1);
00502 
00503         uint8_t* dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00504         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00505                 m_checksum[0] += dest[0] - data;
00506         dest[0] = data;
00507 }

00510 void Message::setDataDouble(const double data, const uint16_t offset)
00511 {
00512         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00513         if (getDataSize() < offset+8)
00514                 resizeData(offset+8);
00515 
00516         uint8_t* dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00517         const uint8_t* cdata = (const uint8_t*) &data;
00518         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00519                 m_checksum[0] += dest[0]  + dest[1]  + dest[2]  + dest[3]
00520                                           +      dest[4]  + dest[5]  + dest[6]  + dest[7]
00521                                           -  cdata[0] - cdata[1] - cdata[2] - cdata[3]
00522                                           -  cdata[4] - cdata[5] - cdata[6] - cdata[7];
00523 
00524         const uint8_t* src = (const uint8_t*) &data;
00525         dest[0] = src[7];       dest[1] = src[6];       dest[2] = src[5];       dest[3] = src[4];
00526         dest[4] = src[3];       dest[5] = src[2];       dest[6] = src[1];       dest[7] = src[0];
00527 }
00528 
00530 void Message::setDataFloat(const float data, const uint16_t offset)
00531 {
00532         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00533         if (getDataSize() < offset+4)
00534                 resizeData(offset+4);
00535 
00536         uint8_t* dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00537         const uint8_t* cdata = (const uint8_t*) &data;
00538         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00539                 m_checksum[0] += dest[0]  + dest[1]  + dest[2]  + dest[3]
00540                                           -  cdata[0] - cdata[1] - cdata[2] - cdata[3];
00541 
00542         const uint8_t* src = (const uint8_t*) &data;
00543         dest[0] = src[3];
00544         dest[1] = src[2];
00545         dest[2] = src[1];
00546         dest[3] = src[0];
00547 }

00550 void Message::setDataF1220(const double data, const uint16_t offset)
00551 {
00552         int32_t val = (int32_t) (data*1048576.0);
00553         setDataLong(val,offset);
00554 }

00557 // Return the current value of the data as a double(64 bits), after converting it from F1220.
00558 void Message::setDataFP1632(const double data, const uint16_t offset)
00559 {
00560         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00561 
00562         if (getDataSize() < offset+6)
00563                 resizeData(offset+6);
00564 
00565         Itypes fp;
00566         fp.d = data;
00567         int32_t dexp = ((fp.i32.i0 & (0x7fffffffL)) >> 20) - 1023;
00568 
00569         int16_t fpint;
00570         int32_t fpfrac;
00571 
00572         if (dexp <= 14)
00573         {
00574                 fp.i16.s0 = (fp.i16.s0 & 0x000F) | 0x0010;
00575                 if (data < 0)
00576                         fp.i64 = -fp.i64;
00577                 if (dexp > -32)
00578                         fp.i64 = fp.i64 >> (20-dexp);   // 52-32 - exponent
00579                 else
00580                         fp.i64 = fp.i64 >> 52;  // this could be optimized?
00581                 fpint = fp.i16.s1;
00582                 fpfrac = fp.i32.i1;
00583         }
00584         else
00585         {
00586                 if (data < 0)
00587                 {
00588                         fpint = ((int16_t) (0x8000));
00589                         fpfrac = 0;
00590                 }
00591                 else
00592                 {
00593                         fpint = 0x7fff;
00594                         fpfrac = -1;
00595                 }
00596         }
00597 
00598         uint8_t* src = (uint8_t*) &fpfrac;
00599         uint8_t* dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00600 
00601         *(dest++) = src[3];
00602         *(dest++) = src[2];
00603         *(dest++) = src[1];
00604         *(dest++) = src[0];
00605 
00606         src = (uint8_t*) &fpint;
00607         *(dest++) = src[1];
00608         *(dest++) = src[0];
00609 }
00610 
00612 void Message::setDataFPValue(const uint64_t outputSettings, const double data, const uint16_t offset)
00613 {
00614         switch (outputSettings & CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_MASK)
00615         {
00616                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FLOAT:
00617                         return setDataFloat((const float)data, offset);
00618 
00619                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_DOUBLE:
00620                         return setDataDouble(data, offset);
00621 
00622                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FP1632:
00623                         return setDataFP1632(data, offset);
00624 
00625                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_F1220:
00626                         return setDataF1220(data, offset);
00627         }
00628 }
00629 
00631 void Message::setDataFPValue(const uint64_t outputSettings, const double *data, uint16_t offset, const uint16_t numValues)
00632 {
00633         for (uint16_t i=0; i<numValues; i++) {
00634                 switch (outputSettings & CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_MASK)
00635                 {
00636                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FLOAT:
00637                                 setDataFloat((float)data[i], offset);
00638                                 offset += 4;
00639                                 break;
00640 
00641                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_DOUBLE:
00642                                 setDataDouble(data[i], offset);
00643                                 offset += 8;
00644                                 break;
00645 
00646                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FP1632:
00647                                 setDataFP1632(data[i], offset);
00648                                 offset += 6;
00649                                 break;
00650 
00651                         case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_F1220:
00652                                 setDataF1220(data[i], offset);
00653                                 offset += 4;
00654                 }
00655         }
00656 }
00657 
00659 void Message::setDataLong(const uint32_t data, const uint16_t offset)
00660 {
00661         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00662         if (getDataSize() < offset+4)
00663                 resizeData(offset+4);
00664 
00665         uint8_t* dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00666         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00667                 m_checksum[0] +=(uint8_t)(dest[0] + dest[1] + dest[2] + dest[3] - (data & 0xFF)-
00668                                                 ((data >> 8) & 0xFF) - ((data >> 16) & 0xFF) - ((data >> 24) & 0xFF));
00669 
00670         const uint8_t* src = (const uint8_t*) &data;
00671         dest[0] = src[3];
00672         dest[1] = src[2];
00673         dest[2] = src[1];
00674         dest[3] = src[0];
00675 }
00676 
00678 void Message::setDataShort(const uint16_t data, const uint16_t offset)
00679 {
00680         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00681         if (getDataSize() < offset+2)
00682                 resizeData(offset+2);
00683 
00684         uint8_t* dest = &(getDataStart()[offset]);
00685         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00686                 m_checksum[0] += dest[0] + dest[1] - (data & 255) - (data >> 8);
00687 
00688         const uint8_t* src = (const uint8_t*) &data;
00689         dest[0] = src[1];
00690         dest[1] = src[0];
00691 }
00692 
00694 // Set the new value of the m_messageId field and update the checksum.
00695 void Message::setMessageId(const uint8_t msgId)
00696 {
00697         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00698         if (m_autoUpdateChecksum)
00699                 m_checksum[0] += m_buffer->m_messageId - msgId;
00700         m_buffer->m_messageId =msgId;
00701 }
00702 
00704 // Copy message src into this
00705 void Message::operator = (const Message& src)
00706 {
00707         CMT_CHECKASSERT
00708 
00709         if (m_maxLength != src.m_maxLength)
00710         {
00711                 CHKDELNUL(m_buffer);
00712                 m_maxLength = src.m_maxLength;
00713                 m_buffer = (MessageHeader*) new char[m_maxLength];
00714         }
00715         memcpy(m_buffer,src.m_buffer,m_maxLength);
00716         ptrdiff_t add = (uint8_t*) src.m_checksum - (uint8_t*) src.m_buffer;
00717         m_checksum = (uint8_t*) m_buffer + add;
00718 }
00719 
00721 // Remove a number of bytes from the message (this will reduce the message size)
00722 void Message::deleteData(uint16_t size, uint16_t offset)
00723 {
00724         if (size == 0)
00725                 return;
00726         uint16_t oldSize = getDataSize();
00727         uint16_t newSize;
00728         if (offset >= oldSize)
00729                 return;
00730 
00731         if (oldSize > offset + size)
00732                 newSize = oldSize - size;
00733         else
00734                 newSize = offset;
00735 
00736         // shift all bytes after the offset down by size positions
00737         uint8_t* address = getDataBuffer();
00738         for (uint16_t i = offset; i < newSize; ++i)
00739                 address[i] = address[i+size];
00740 
00741         // reduce the message length
00742         resizeData(newSize);
00743 }
00744 
00746 // Insert a number of bytes into the message (this will increase the message size)
00747 void Message::insertData(uint16_t size, uint16_t offset)
00748 {
00749         if (size == 0)
00750                 return;
00751         // stretch the message
00752         uint16_t oldSize = getDataSize();
00753         resizeData(oldSize + size);
00754         // shift the bytes after the offset up by size positions
00755         uint8_t* address = getDataBuffer();
00756         for (uint16_t i = oldSize-1; i >= offset && i < oldSize; --i)
00757                 address[i+size] = address[i];
00758 }
00759 
00761 // Compute the checksum of the given byte string.
00762 uint8_t computeChecksum(const uint8_t* buffer, uint32_t length)
00763 {
00764         uint8_t cs = 0;
00765         while (length--)
00766                 cs -= *(buffer++);
00767 
00768         return cs;
00769 }
00770 
00771 } // end of xsens namespace
